title: Define PetHealthMonitor System Requirements
description: Research and document the necessary features for the PetHealthMonitor device, including hardware, software, connectivity, and user interface requirements.

title: Design the Hardware Architecture
description: Develop the blueprint for the PetHealthMonitor wearable device, focusing on vital sign sensors, activity trackers, and battery life.

title: Design the Software Architecture
description: Outline the software architecture for the PetHealthMonitor device, including operating system, programming language, and APIs.

title: Design the User Interface and Experience
description: Create wireframes and prototypes for the PetHealthMonitor app, focusing on user-friendly design and clear communication of pet health data.

title: Implement Core Vital Sign Sensor Functionality
description: Develop and integrate sensors for monitoring pets' vital signs, such as heart rate, temperature, and oxygen levels.

title: Implement Activity Tracker Functionality
description: Create algorithms for tracking pets' activity levels and implementing them in the PetHealthMonitor device.

title: Create Connection Protocol for Device Communication
description: Establish communication protocols between the PetHealthMonitor device and smartphones, web portals, or veterinary systems.

title: Write Unit Tests for Device Functionality
description: Create and execute unit tests to ensure the proper functioning of each device component.
dependencies: Implement Core Vital Sign Sensor Functionality

title: Write Integration Tests for Device Functionality
description: Create and execute integration tests to ensure the seamless functioning of multiple device components.
dependencies: Implement Core Vital Sign Sensor Functionality

title: Document the PetHealthMonitor System
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the PetHealthMonitor device, including user manuals, developer guides, and technical specifications.
